subject: Basketball
Private and Sectarian Schools
Education and Schools
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Still strolling the sideline at 77, Mr. Curran has won more basketball and baseball games — 2,491 — than any high school coach in the United States.
snippet: Still strolling the sideline at 77, Mr. Curran has won more basketball and baseball games — 2,491 — than any high school coach in the United States.
